servinfo.title: No cool air comes out (radiator cooling fan motor does not operate)

condition.ptxt: No cool air comes out (radiator cooling fan motor does not operate)

action.ptxt: Check related fuses, and then check for short circuit to ground.

ps.ptxt: Radiator cooling fan motor relay faulty

action.ptxt: Check radiator cooling fan motor relay referring to Radiator Cooling Fan Relay Inspection .
Check radiator cooling fan motor referring to Radiator Cooling Fan Motor On-Vehicle Inspection .
Check ECM referring to A/C System Inspection at ECM .
Check HVAC control module referring to HVAC Control Module and Its Circuits Inspection .
